name: Dream Trigger™ 3D
description: Dream Trigger 3D showcases the wow factor of the Nintendo 3DS™ like no other game. A stunning mixture of explosive graphics and nonstop action, it is the signature shooter for the system. Play as a 'fixer of dreams', turning nightmare landscapes into gorgeous dreamscape in this must-have visual masterpiece for all Nintendo 3DS owners. • Stunning 3D graphics never before seen on a handheld system • Mind bending 3D visuals graphics across over 50 different levels • 100 trophies to collect • 2 player multiplayer • You are a fixer of dreams, bending nightmares into gorgeous dreamscapes • The next generation of original core shooters comes to Nintendo 3DS
